question: In which nation "Tai National Park" is located?
explanation: Tai National Park is located in Cote d'Ivoire. It is one of the last primary rainforests in West Africa. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It houses pygmy hippopotamus, olive colobus monkeys, leopards, chimpanzees and Jentink's duiker. Tai forest is a natural reservoir of the Ebola Virus.
